text:
Maria stepped out into the bright morning sunshine and felt her heart lift immediately. The promotion she had been hoping for was finally hers and everything seemed to be falling perfectly into place. She could barely contain her excitement as she walked down the street with a spring in her step.
The world looked different today somehow more colorful and vibrant than usual. Even the busy traffic and bustling crowds seemed delightful rather than overwhelming. She found herself smiling at strangers and humming a tune she could not quite remember learning.
!
